scenes.action_text: BOOKWORM Written by Toby Harvard EXT. SUBURBAN BACK YARD -- NIGHT A crackly LP plays on a turntable somewhere. Items in a tomboy's lair as CREDITS roll -- maps on the walls, stacks and stacks of books, folk LP's, framed photos of New Zealand's wilderness, a bonsai tree, well-loved toys... MILDRED (11, red-cheeked, bespectacled) at the window, looks through binoculars, into the backyard: Where a chunk of raw beef glistens under a BEER-CRATE TRAP, held up by
